title: An All-in-one Free-Standing Single-Ion Conducting Semi-Solid Polymer Electrolyte for High-Performance Practical Li Metal Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02208D, Paper
JinPing Zhang, Jie Zhu, Ruiqi Zhao, Jie Liu, Xingchen Song, Nuo Xu, Yansong Liu, Hongtao Zhang, Xiangjian Wan, Yanfeng Ma, Chenxi Li, Yongsheng Chen
Single-ion conducting polymer electrolytes, characterized by effective Li+ transport and dendrite mitigation, are emerging as promising candidates for the highly demanded lithium metal batteries. However, despite the promise, their current...
